message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and am excited to see what you can do with it. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice. However, $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
